name: Fatty Jump Free
description:
Help Fatty so he doesn't lose his weight!

Fatty has to work his way through the levels of this classic Jump N' Run game and loses weight wile doing so! On his way he's attacked by all sorts of healthy veggies, shot with fish and has to make it through complicated situations. So he can hold his weight and doesn't lose his sexy body, he constantly has to stuff his face with candy.

Not an easy task, when wild vegetables want to get to you!
Make your way through the 2-dimensional worlds as Fatty and keep eating candy, or you'll be very, very sorry.

Thanks to the High-Score-List, you can see who's best at Fatty Jump.
Can you make it to the top?

In a bonus level, you can prove you're a worthy crook.
Are you ready for Fatty?


Supported Devices:
==================
- iPad 1, 2, 3
- iPhone 4, 4s
- iPod touch 4
